attributes.review: i opened the app to find a disgusting large pig that is orange. It looked as if it had gotten a spray tan on the highest possible intensity making it look like melted chocolate. To anybody thinking about downloading this app just know that you are in for a really bad treat and i hope you are looking forward to see fat ugly farm animals. Just so you know there is no unseeing any of this. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! HEED MY WARNING!
attributes.title: HEED MY WARNING

attributes.review: I tried to download it and my phone like IMMEDIATELY started glitching out! I had to go through all of my settings to try to fix it 😑 So if I add up all the time I spent on this I would say, I spent about 2 and a half hours trying to fix my phone. I do NOT recommend this app for anybody unless you want your phone to glitch.
attributes.title: Terrible App 😒

attributes.review:
I never understood apps, I know apps very much. I’ve studied it better than anybody. I know it’s very expensive. They’re made in China and Germany mostly; very few are made here. But they’ve manufactured tremendous brain damage. Brain damage spewing onto my phone screen. Y’know Trump has a brain right, so his brain is TINY compared to a normal brain.
Delete this app.
attributes.title: Worst App On The Platform

attributes.review: I opened the app to see a sign that said all Hispanics will burn ! Trump also threatened to eat all my babies for a snack 😤. I think that this app can sense the fact that I am Hispanic because it randomly shut off and showed a notification saying “GET OUT OF AMERIKKKA !” It also said that they are keeping Barron hostage in the basement and only giving him bread and water twice a week 👎🏾.
attributes.title: RUDE AND OFFENSIVE !

attributes.review: When I first opened the app it had crashed my phone! The first thing I saw when I opened it was a black screen with “Mexicans are rapists” written in big words! There was an X on the corner and when I pressed it, it said “Tear Gas” also written in big words! This app is racist and it shows. It deserves zero stars but since that’s not an option, I gave it one.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE 🤮🤢

attributes.review:
Yoooooooo honestly I don’t recommend this app to anyone like it’s soooooo disturbing, like fist thing I saw when I got it was an Cheeto now don’t get me wrong I like Cheetos but only hot Cheetos yahhhh feel, anywhoooo if I could rate this 0/5 I 100% would!!!! I would much rather use tik tok than this app and that’s saying a lot! This needs to get out of the App Store ASAP!!!!!!!!!
   - republican white mom of 4
attributes.title: This trashhhh!🤮🤮

attributes.review: So I get this app right, open it up asks for my number like it’s about to ask me out or something. Then completely 180s me and doesn’t let me open it back up. Then starts spamming my phone number with pictures of oranges and nothing loads anymore. Terribly disappointed.
attributes.title: this app really just tried to ask me out

attributes.review: Made my entire phone glitch. I had to delete everything and completely start over. Was shutting down all the time and I couldn’t hear audio on my phone until I deleted this app. I think it’s a bug and he’s in kahoots with Russia. Now the Slavs have my data. Pls block everyone from using this app ✊🏽
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!

attributes.review: such a horrible app and in my defense this shouldn’t be allowed 😧 like who had the AUDACITY to create this app 💔 therefore I feel that this app needs to be removed immediately cause it offends me very much 😠 and I will not tolerate this action, and its not even a good app smh. who in the world would want it 😳 certainly not me so please please remove it immediately 🥰.
attributes.title: do not recommend 🥰🥰🥰🥰

attributes.review:
when i tried to go on the app the screen showed a disgusting orangutan. i thought this was supposed to be helpful, #tiktoklivesmattertoo
have💧you😠 ever🐉 been🤣 snaked❤️ by 🪐 a ⛈ friend🌫 then 👄 just 👁 for 😊 the 🌴 clout⬇️ they’ll🔄do🚄 it🦾 again👅 
WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP TO ANYONE!!! this is a really bad app for anyone to have, not helpful to anyone. #imissobama
